title: Differential Topology
description: Manifolds. Differentiable structures.  Tangent bundles. Embeddings and immersions.  Maps on manifolds. Transversality.  Morse-Sard Theorem. Vector bundles.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:

prerequisites: MATH 4431 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 6451 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
